name: Tina's Spooky Journey through the Underworld
name_original: Tina's Spooky Journey through the Underworld
description:
Play as Tina, a small dog traveling through the Underworld.
Bark at ghosts to push them towards the lights.
Clear all the ghosts to move on to the next level.
Don't get too close to the spirits, or you'll get super spooked!

Includes 5 levels
~20 min play time
Gamepad controller recommended

-Controls-

Movement:
-Keyboard WASD / Gamepad Left Analog
Bark:
-Keyboard Enter / Gamepad X Button
Jump:
-Keyboard Space / Gamepad A Button

-Credits-

Puppy 3d Model by Phantasy 999D via TurboSquid
Music by Loyalty Freak Music via FreeMusicArchive
Dog SFX via Freesound
